General.Name: Shanta Gold Limited
General.Description: Shanta Gold Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and production of gold in East Africa. It holds a 100% interest in the New Luika gold mine property located in Songwe district of Southwestern Tanzania. The company also owns the Singida gold mine located in the Ikungi region of Central Tanzania; and the West Kenya Project in Kenya. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Saint Peter Port, Guernsey.
General.Address: 11 New Street, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 3EG

1.Name: Mr. Luke Alexander Leslie
1.Title: CFO, Head of Corp. Devel., Director
